pr_title: Modified test infra to run integration test in helm3

timeline.message: Add provision to describe the lb pod when fails to start
Modified the helm3 logic in LoadBalancer.java
Added debug option to helm upgrade

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand this and it seems brittle.  If the Helm install is supposed to fail, I would expect a non-zero exit code from invoking the helm binary and that the list of installed Helm charts does not include the release we just tried to install.
timeline.author: rjeberhard

replies.bodyText:
Here the callHelmInstall() expects to fail with a proper exception with the following message
Error: rendered manifests contain a resource that already exists. Unable to continue with install: existing resource conflict: kind: Secret, namespace: ons, name: weblogic-operator-secrets
replies.author: anpanigr

timeline.author: rjeberhard
rjeberhard

timeline.bodyText: Same comment... I'm less concerned with the fact that Helm failed with a certain message than that the Helm install failed and that the release was not installed.
timeline.author: rjeberhard

replies.bodyText: I removed the Helm version check
replies.author: anpanigr

timeline.author: rjeberhard

timeline.bodyText: Why are you adding the "--debug" flag here?  Is it because we are going to assert on debug output?
timeline.author: rjeberhard

replies.bodyText: I want to know the reason if the helm command fails so that it will be easier to debug when the test fails
replies.author: anpanigr

timeline.message: Remove support for Helm 2 based on review comments
remove helm v2 support from setupenv.sh
sync up develop branch, few changes to ItUsabilityOperatorHelmChart class
